thread.section_title: VORTEX SPAS NEW ZEALAND LIMITED Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of VORTEX SPAS NEW ZEALAND LIMITED | vortexspas.co.nz
thread.title: Raewyn Champness
thread.title_full: VORTEX SPAS NEW ZEALAND LIMITED reviewed by Raewyn Champness

author: Raewyn Champness
title: Raewyn Champness
text: Apart from some issues with the placement of the spare which wouldn't have happened if a site visit was done, we had an overall good experience. We love the spa pool and the delivery man and his supervisor Jack were excellent. We would advise that for any one purchasing a larger than normal spa that you do a site visit so they don't have the issues we had.
